author: chris2_2_2
content: As someone who uses the eth chain (I've moved a lot to Polygon but not all) I'd like to register my opposition to the proposal to increase block times to 17-20+ seconds. Your basically going to be pumping up gas 3x or more for no benefit and make ETH unusable for casual users. I'd prefer you just pushed back the bomb 2-3 months if your not sure. The bomb should be delayed the day it affects block times even if its just delayed for weeks. Thank you.
